values:
Butterflies~? How very~ pretty~! Though where~ did they all come from?

Mm~, one of them has decided to settle on the end of my nose ♥

Mm~, this is a rather distressing situation. I thought it was a curse at first, but the Network suggests otherwise. Very~ inconvenient, to say the least. Ion dear, do not waste any of our capsules until we are sure that they will actually be effective ♥ We will not be taking any visitors until this is over. [Private to Basil & Carmine//Unhackable] If this little problem with our haemoglobin capsules being ineffective has not been resolved within the next three days or so, it would be best if you did not turn up for your duties until it has~ been remedied. I am sure you both understand me ♥ [/Private] [Private to Abel//Unhackable] Abel, should this continue for too long, would you please make sure that no one ends up being harmed? And do not let Esther attempt to come and see us. I know it is too early to actually be worried but I do not wish to take any risks. [/Private]

Oh~, aren't they simply adorable? ♥
Have you decided on names yet, Asta? Esther dear, come and visit Ion and myself so that you may see the new pets. [Private to Abel//Unhackable] Whatever it is that you intend to do, please do remember there are others here who care about you who will be greatly upset if anything more goes wrong. ((ooc: Distraction technique is go! Mood reads as happy. She isn't that hopeful this is going to work, though :S))

Basil dear, may I ask you for a favour? Esther has not been feeling well and wishes for something light to eat, would you be able to prepare something for her~? And to give her a few suggestions on appropriate food? I must say it is rather disconcerting how the City is capable of turning an apparently pleasant curse into something so decidedly unpleasant~, but then again I suppose it is foolish to expect any truly pleasant curses. And I see that once again we have many newcomers~. Welcome ♥ I wonder if anyone from home will arrive.

Abel, I realized it would not be fair to force you into a dress~. So I decided to give you a choice between two. The second one would~ most likely require the use of a corset. I must say I prefer it ♥ Oh~, and I almost forgot. Ion dear~, you are going to look so~ cute in this. ♥ ((ooc: she loves you both. Really.))

Astaroth, Basil, could you help me to move the furniture and anything else Abel might hurt himself on? I didn't realize how delicate he is and I'm sure he'll manage to have more than enough accidents anyway~

Oh~, and I am missing some of my hair ribbons~. Has anyone seen them? Abel, I know~ that pink suits you, but if you wanted to borrow them you only needed to ask ♥

My grandson has been severely injured. Why or by whom I have yet no idea though I suspect, and still, it makes no sense. Once Ion is stable we shall look after him ourselves. Lilith, thank you for informing me he was attacked, and for helping him.

This is so~ strange.

Being able to fly is fun, though.

<s>I wish I weren't so small, I don't feel very safe.</s>

<small>((ooc: a butterfly is appropriate for her ^^;))</small>

Mm~, the City has simply been flooded~ with new arrivals the past few days~! I do hope everyone is managing to settle in well~? ♥ I need some help deciding on a costume for the ~Mad Tea Party~, I simply cannot decide, and it's in only two days time! Oh~, and is anyone else I know going to be there?

Little child, be not afraid The rain pounds harsh against the glass Like an unwanted stranger There is no danger I am here tonight Little child Be not afraid Though thunder explodes And lightning flash Illuminates your tearstained face I am here tonight And someday you'll know That nature is so This same rain that draws you near me Falls on rivers and land And forests and sand Makes the beautiful world that you see In the morning Little child Be not afraid The storm clouds mask your beloved moon And its candlelight beams Still keep pleasant dreams I am here tonight Little child Be not afraid The wind makes creatures of our trees And the branches to hands They're not real, understand And I am here tonight And someday you'll know That nature is so This same rain that draws you near me Falls on rivers and land And forest and sand Makes the beautiful world that you see In the morning For you know, once even I Was a little child And I was afraid But a gentle someone always came To dry all my tears Trade sweet sleep the fears And to give a kiss goodnight Well, now I am grown And these days have shown Rain's a part of how life goes But it's dark and it's late So I'll hold you and wait 'til your frightened eyes do close And I hope that you'll know That nature is so This same rain that draws you near me Falls on rivers and land And forests and sand Makes the beautiful world that you see In the morning Everything's fine in the morning The rain will be gone in the morning But I'll still be here in the morning ((ooc: Vienna Teng's Lullaby for a Stormy Night))

[Filtered to Carmine's friends & allies//against Carmine] I cannot~ be sure but I'm afraid that whatever curse caused the last incident to happen is affecting Carmine again~. We need to make sure that she is not~ provoked into feeling unsafe by anyone. She was already upset enough without needing to deal with having hurt someone else once again. [/Filter] ((ooc: filter is basically Nel, Mao, Hei, Astaroth and Basil. Poke me if I forgot someone. And Mirka wants her Auto-doll servants back so that she doesn't need to get all worried about people >.>))

[Filtered to Sir Arthur] Thank you for such a wonderful~ time at the winter gala~ ♥ [/filter] Mm~, it was a pleasure meeting so many people at the ball. Such a lovely occasion~. Nicholas, Michaela, Artemis, I greatly enjoyed talking to you all~ there. Ion~ dear, thank you for the dance ♥ Oh~, and Carmine, there's something I wish to discuss with you as soon as you have a moment~. ((ooc: everyone who gave Mirka a present or who she considers a friend will have had a basket of treats(I'm sure she'd be better at choosing than I am ^^;;) delivered to them as a thank you(after Christmas since she doesn't really celebrate it). Radu gets one too cause she likes screwing with his head that way >.>))

[Filtered to Astaroth] Astaroth~, since we'll be at least seven for the ballet, could you reserve a box for us~? Mm~, and do you think we should ask Basil and Carmine if they'd like to attend with us? [/Filter] The apartment looks very nice this way~, Basil ♥ Oh~, and Lyra~ dear, may I speak to you for a moment?

Oh~, it is a relief to be able to go outside again~. A little bit cold though. Ion~, if we go out do remember to dress up warmly. Mm~, and are we all agreed to go to see the ballet~? Astaroth, when did you say it was being held? [Private to Household] Ingram Prisken will be spending some time at the apartment now and then~. He'll be my guest and I know you'll all treat him as such~ ♥ [/Private] Basil, Carmine, may I have a word with you two? ♥~

It's hard to know whether to believe~ what someone says when first they deny all knowledge~ of an event because it 'had not happened to them yet' and then they issue a statement about the very same thing, a statement which is also inaccurate. Whatever I've done~ has been from duty and love towards my Empress, the Empire, and my family; I have dedicated my life to this and once I have returned home I will continue aiding the Empress with making sure all the those in the Empire, both Methuselah and~ Terrans, are safe and able to make the most of their lives. Our goal of peace with Outer will also not be neglected. Mm~, now that's over with~. Really, everyone does seem most inclined to explain things today. A curse, once again. Less dangerous than the last~ but more painful for some~? Hmm. Ion~ dear, please stay close for now ♥ I'd like your company.

I only tease the people close~ to me so much to show them I care and so that they don't see when I'm worried about them.

<small>Oh~, another curse? Well, I'm sure~ it's nothing they hadn't realized already ♥</small>

[Filtered to Household including Basil & Carmine] It seems that the water supply has been contaminated with a virus. Let's not~ risk anything and make use only of safe sources, mm~? ♥ Basil, please do make sure we have an adequate supply of bottled water. And take care that Lambo doesn't end up playing with any water that may be unsafe~. Carmine~, are you settling in well with your work? [/Filter] No~ curses for the past few days but still the City is so restless. And..does anyone know if Mitsuhide is all right?
M~? I think I can tell what that's~ for. And I'm so good at it too! ♥ My name's initial, how sweet. ((ooc: strikes are thoughts. M is for manipulating, though 'mocking' fits just as well XD))

That was a fun curse! I really enjoyed myself ♥ And congratulations to the winners~ Designing clothing was fun~. Maybe I should pick it up as a hobby? [Private to Household] I've employed Carmine~ to help Basil with his tasks, now that there are four of us here. Astaroth, I've told her to discuss her wages with you ♥ Shahrzad~, are you feeling any better? [/Private] ((ooc: Household would be Asta, Ion and Shah.))

It's so nice to see the City give us a chance to carry on as usual in between curses. And everyone I've spoken to has been wonderfully helpful and friendly. It's been a pleasure to speak to all of you! Radu, are you quite alright? Lyra, I look forward to meeting you and your guardian whenever is convenient for the both of you~. Let's go for that walk later tonight, Cheza. I've heard that your singing is lovely. Oh, and my dear little Ion, do come and spend some time with your grandmother. We'll be seeing so~ much more of each other now that I have so much free time here ♥ [Private to Ion//Unhackable] As so~on as you can. And in private~. We can have a lovely little chat!

It's come to my attention that there is a small dispute over who has the right of guardianship over the Count of Memphis, Ion Fortuna...not that he isn't of age to look after himself, but still. Of course, I'm sure most people aren't bothered over such a trivial matter, and it is obviously not an issue anymore now that I'm here, but I thought it would be much simpler this way~. Not that I blame the Duchess of Kiev or Radu Barvon for both wanting to look after dear Ion, he is so cute after all ♥; however, Ion will be staying with myself and Astaroth. And in the case that I leave the City, I have complete confidence in the Duchess of Kiev's ability to protect him. Therefore, the Duchess of Kiev shall be the one to look after him in the case of my absence. Misunderstanding all cleared up? Wonderful~! ♥ ((ooc: no, Radu, of course she didn't omit your title on purpose >.>))

Oh~ <s>This definitely isn't the Empire. What's happened?</s>

Could someone tell me where I am?

<small>((ooc: Strikes are thoughts. She's sitting by the fountain, holding her cat in her lap, so if anyone wants to meet the 'seemingly' young girl, go ahead. Otherwise, normal network comments ^-^))</small>
